'''Waveriding Adventurer (III)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Fontaine: Dance of the Dew-White Springs (III)]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Morte Region]] and [[Erinnyes Forest]].
